TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Kano_go, title = Kano_go, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kano_go} }

S.FORM: Kano go maki squ Taitung. su'unun kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 79.75 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 17.39 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0.74 km²), 3,727 hi ku su'unun kwara alang hi kya, 1,397 buwan ku kwarakya, tiku sahuy na alang Gyencumin ga 1,998 hi, kyala kwara pinspung s'uli ga 54%. kwara qsahuy na qalang Gyencumin ga Taywang Gyencumin na Amis qu smrrhu ku pyux s'uli taya kya. sinpngan sehu s'uli sku sahuy go. cyux maki' te hwatong cwongku'. kya' gwagiq na rgrgyax, rroq na b'bu', b'nux ki hici'. cingay sslaq nya' pbkuw sa babaw rhzyal ka spzyang mnanak nya'. 'bwan gwagiq t'aring sasan tehuk lmhngan, mtasaw msngya qu kya', ru hupa' qsya' nya', kya' cingay lahuy pinbahuw nya'. ays ptyaw sebu Kano go ays psgayun 7 ru 7 alang. 7 alang hani ga, Parayapay , Rekat , Efong , Pakala'ac , Pailasan , Salinliw , Kanao'pu . kayal qalang smpung kinhrhur nya' ga 24.5℃. rekisi Maki' sa cingcaw ga ubuy nqu Kwangsyangcyu, muwah Gipun lga 'yugun nha' sa Taytongting kwansancyun luyecwang, masuq pcriq lga 'yugun nha sa "Luye syang". Nanak cyux maki' sa lekwonghwo nqu sangye ki syaye, psqunun nha squ yanping syang ka mglu lwansan cwen. minkahul inu squ sllwan nya' te qutux, sraral ga qnahi' na rhzyal, wahan lmhngaw bbqanux, yasa sllwan nha' "Luye". maki' na' Gipun mga, pzyux bbqanux mwah mqzinah sa Luye , qzyunam m'gaga' nqu Takasagun. Skahul Gipun mita' ga, Luye qani ga blaq wahan maki' nqu kki'an, misu lga blaq wahan maki' nqu lmhngaw ini' ptzyuwaw na komuing. Yasa spyangun nha' wahan lmosay mcisal nqu qalang. tuqi qsya' kya' llyung Luye , llyung Penan. ssquliq pinlpgan mspat seng kinhmayan nya' squ Kano go syang. pzyux ini' ptnaq nqu 'Tayal nyux 'mimaw gmlu maki' sqani. cyux maki' Taytong syeng qu Luye syang, yatux nya' ga cyux msobih squ kwansan cyen, 'zil nya' ga cyux msobih squ haytwang syang, 'llaw nya' ga cyux msobih squ Tonghe syang, kyahu' nya' ga cyux msobih squ yenping syang. ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy 鹿野國民小學 Luye pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy 永安國民小學 yung'an pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy 瑞源國民小學 zweyen pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy 瑞豐國民小學 zewbwung pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy 龍田國民小學 lwongtyen pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas 鹿野國民中學 Luye pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas 瑞源國民中學 zweyen pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas pqwasan biru 'laqi' seneng tuqi 'san basu' "Tingtong k'yun." qu spzyang glgang nha qalang musa' ana inu'. kisya' glgan Luye eki' spyangan na pinbahu ocya' bulu', ocya' soto' son nah' uzi. mami' bulu'. ulong mtalah. bilus mtalah pngran hwolongkwo gitu' guqoh sikya' bongli' sikya' ngta' luye hmgiru lmosay yasa spyangun nha' wahan lmosay mcisal nqu qalang. 武陵綠色隧道 wuling luyse swetaw 新良濕地 singlyang syti 二層坪水橋 eycen swecyaw 鹿野高台 Luye kawtay balloon Kano go syang ga, te qutux sqqas zyuwaw nqu balloon nqu syang. Flying umbrella Kano go syang ga, yasa inblaq nqu mlaka' na rhzyal ka ini' kpzyux.

Kano go maki sqo Taitong. so'onon kwara glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 79.75 km² (rhyan rinpang glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 17.39 km², rr'an hyan glabang lingay 'kiyan ga 0.74 km²), 3,727 hi ko so'onon kwara alang hi kya, 1,397 bowan ko kwarakya, tiko sahoy na alang Gyencomin ga 1,998 hi, kyala kwara pinspong s'oli ga 54%. kwara qsahoy na qalang Gyencomin ga Taywang Gyencomin na Amis qo smrrho ko pyox s'oli taya kya. sinpngan seho s'oli sko sahoy go. cyox maki' te hwatong cwongko'. kya' gwagiq na rgrgyax, rroq na b'bo', b'nox ki hici'. cingay sslaq nya' pbkow sa babaw rhzyal ka spzyang mnanak nya'. 'bwan gwagiq t'aring sasan tehok lmhngan, mtasaw msngya qo kya', ro hopa' qsya' nya', kya' cingay lahoy pinbahow nya'. ays ptyaw sebo Kano go ays psgayon 7 ro 7 alang. 7 alang hani ga, Parayapay , Rekat , Efong , Pakala'ac , Pailasan , Salinliw , Kanao'po . kayal qalang smpong kinhrhor nya' ga 24.5℃. rekisi Maki' sa cingcaw ga oboy nqo Kwangsyangcyo, mowah Gipon lga 'yogon nha' sa Taytongting kwansancyon loyecwang, masoq pcriq lga 'yogon nha sa "Loye syang". Nanak cyox maki' sa lekwonghwo nqo sangye ki syaye, psqonon nha sqo yanping syang ka mglo lwansan cwen. minkahol ino sqo sllwan nya' te qotox, sraral ga qnahi' na rhzyal, wahan lmhngaw bbqanox, yasa sllwan nha' "Loye". maki' na' Gipon mga, pzyox bbqanox mwah mqzinah sa Loye , qzyonam m'gaga' nqo Takasagon. Skahol Gipon mita' ga, Loye qani ga blaq wahan maki' nqo kki'an, miso lga blaq wahan maki' nqo lmhngaw ini' ptzyowaw na komoing. Yasa spyangon nha' wahan lmosay mcisal nqo qalang. toqi qsya' kya' llyong Loye , llyong Penan. ssqoliq pinlpgan mspat seng kinhmayan nya' sqo Kano go syang. pzyox ini' ptnaq nqo 'Tayal nyox 'mimaw gmlo maki' sqani. cyox maki' Taytong syeng qo Loye syang, yatox nya' ga cyox msobih sqo kwansan cyen, 'zil nya' ga cyox msobih sqo haytwang syang, 'llaw nya' ga cyox msobih sqo Tonghe syang, kyaho' nya' ga cyox msobih sqo yenping syang. ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy 鹿野國民小學 Loye pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy 永安國民小學 yong'an pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy 瑞源國民小學 zweyen pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy 瑞豐國民小學 zewbwong pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy 龍田國民小學 lwongtyen pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas 鹿野國民中學 Loye pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas 瑞源國民中學 zweyen pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas pqwasan biro 'laqi' seneng toqi 'san baso' "Tingtong k'yon." qo spzyang glgang nha qalang mosa' ana ino'. kisya' glgan Loye eki' spyangan na pinbaho ocya' bolo', ocya' soto' son nah' ozi. mami' bolo'. olong mtalah. bilos mtalah pngran hwolongkwo gito' goqoh sikya' bongli' sikya' ngta' loye hmgiro lmosay yasa spyangon nha' wahan lmosay mcisal nqo qalang. 武陵綠色隧道 woling loyse swetaw 新良濕地 singlyang syti 二層坪水橋 eycen swecyaw 鹿野高台 Loye kawtay balloon Kano go syang ga, te qotox sqqas zyowaw nqo balloon nqo syang. Flying ombrella Kano go syang ga, yasa inblaq nqo mlaka' na rhzyal ka ini' kpzyox.
